comments:
Using build I20051116-1332.

I set a breakpoint in SourceElementParser constructor and when reached, select
SourceElementParser instance, write "prob" in Variables view and try to complete
after...

Then I get "Error Executing Command" message dialog telling me that "Content
Assist" did not finish normally.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 116897 ***
